timeline.message: Zone information for containers to replace com.yahoo.config.provision

timeline.bodyText: Suppressing "unused" should be unnecessary when you have the Inject annotation.
timeline.author: gjoranv

replies.bodyText: IntelliJ don't think so, but I guess it's clear enough with the annotation anyway.
replies.author: bratseth

timeline.bodyText: I suggest to skip this comment. What does it mean?
timeline.author: gjoranv

replies.bodyText: It means to not use it ... I probably want to switch to another config later which will break any who use this method.
replies.author: bratseth

timeline.bodyText: Perhaps this should be e.g. ´stringValue()´, and return a String that is less tempting to parse from toString.
timeline.author: gjoranv

replies.bodyText: I would agree if this was further in but I think this is fine for an "edge API" class.
replies.author: bratseth
